nl.strohalm.cyclos.services.stats.activity

Class TransactionCountPerMemberStats

  • java.lang.Object
    • nl.strohalm.cyclos.services.stats.activity.TransactionCountPerMemberStats

  • public class TransactionCountPerMemberStats
extends java.lang.Object
    Class with common helper functions on retrieving statistics about transactions per member, for activity statistics.
    Author:
    Rinke

    • Method Detail

      • getPercentageNoTraders

        public static StatisticalNumber getPercentageNoTraders(int npart,
                                       int nfull)
        calculates the percentage of members not trading, including a confidence interval
        Parameters:
        npart - an int indicating the number of members not trading
        nfull - an int indicating the total number of members
        Returns:
        a StatisticalNumber indicating the percentage of members not trading.

      • getTransactionCountPerAllMembers

        public java.util.List<java.lang.Number> getTransactionCountPerAllMembers(java.lang.Integer numberOfMembersForPeriod)
        For each member, the number of transactions is counted. All these results are put in a list, which is returned by this method.
        Returns:
        a List with Numbers representing the number of transactions each member performed

      • getTransactionCountPerTradingMember

        public java.util.List<java.lang.Number> getTransactionCountPerTradingMember()
        For each trading member, the number of transactions is counted. All these results are put in a list, which is returned by this method.
        Returns:
        a List with Numbers representing the number of transactions each trading member performed

      • getTransfersPerTrader

        public java.util.List<Pair<Member,java.lang.Integer>> getTransfersPerTrader()
        Returns:
        a list with pairs, where the first element is the member, and the second is it's number of transfers. Only trading members are included.
